name: Chelsea Apps
tagline: We challenge your ideas so users don’t have to!
description:
Chelsea Apps is a mobile and web app development agency with over 70 million app downloads and generating in excess of £250m for our clients.
We’re a team that only work on projects that we believe users will love. It’s not about building any old thing so we can grow our agency, we want to build applications that make a real impact, so we challenge you and your ideas at every stage, so users don’t have to.
Our team represents a blend of youth and experience with strengths in areas such as creativity, development, enterprise-level security and big data innovation.
We’ve worked on some great projects for equally great clients, including the likes of TFL, Ladbrokes, Waitrose, KPMG, Peace One Day and Telefonica among others.
 
Service listing: 
-UX and UI design
-Design Sprints & Workshops
-Web apps
-Mobile apps
-Android apps
-IOS apps
 
Get in touch if you have a project you want to discuss!
